name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior VoIP Engineer with 10+ years of experience in designing and implementing VoIP solutions. Proficient in **AWS**, **Amazon Connect**, **SIP**, **WebRTC**, and **troubleshooting** to create seamless communication systems. Proven track record of delivering innovative solutions at industry leaders like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
